group_1.textLeft: Ooh, if it isn’t a super familiar face!

group_1.textRight: It’s not a consultation office today!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, we imagined that if we kept calling it the consultation office,
people might get it confused with the Festival @Main Office.

group_1.textRight: So we thought instead of producing unnecessary confusion,
it would be better rather if we changed the @naming of this establishment!

group_1.textLeft: Well, a lost child did come in right after though, @and we had to look everywhere for their parents.

group_1.textRight: Still, having a place to sit and relax like this is nice.
There’s even candy!

group_1.textLeft: But then that’d just be providing a simple place @for people to rest. Boring!

group_1.textRight: Boring…?

group_1.textLeft: That’s why we made this game. Tada!

group_1.narration: “Hype it up! It’s the Coffee Taste-Testing Championship!”

group_1.textLeft: In this game, you drink five types of coffee to guess what varieties they are.
You can discuss it as a team, since coming up with @the answers off the top of your head will be hard!

group_1.textRight: Oh!? It’ll be just like a game show. Sounds like a @fun plan!
Would varieties be something like Brazilian or @Jamaican Blue Mountain coffee?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that’s it.

group_1.textRight: I made a mistake placing an order and ended up @buying more coffee than we could ever need.
Emiri-san is the one who converted this failure @into a game.

group_1.textLeft: It’s great you didn’t kill yourself, Asuka.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Sasara-san!?

group_1.textLeft: How ‘bout it? Wanna play? There’s no prizes @by the way!

group_1.textRight: I’ll have a go…
Is it possible… that Shizuku-chan’s taken @an interest in coffee tasting?
Just as expected of the daughter of a coffee shop owner.
Since it seems to be a team game with discussion allowed, we should join in too!

group_1.textCenter: This is useless! Which is which?

group_1.textRight: Everything’s delicious!

group_1.textLeft: That’s about it for the impressions we have… Even @the difference between these five flavors is foggy...

group_1.textCenter: (This taste-testing challenge is closer to being a guessing riddle.)
(As far as I’m concerned, this is a chance to score @a bunch of laughter!)
(I can make Shizuku-chan laugh, like I originally intended, by giving a really stupid answer!)

group_1.textRight: Hozumi-san, I’m sorry.
We really aren’t of much help.

group_1.textLeft: It’s okay. Leave it to me.
…[wait:1.0][chara:300701:motion_000][chara:300701:lipSynch_1]Yeah, this is easy.

group_1.textRight: Mexican.

group_1.textLeft: That’s correct!

group_1.textRight: Next is… Blue Mountain. And this is... Kilimanjaro.

group_1.textLeft: Wow… You easily got three right in a row...!
What’s this, what’s this~? Do we have a @PhD in Coffee here~?

group_1.textCenter: (Darn it! It’s going to end before I can do my @funnyman act, again…!)

group_1.textRight: Ahhh! I know them too!

group_1.textLeft: Hm...

group_1.textRight: This is… Mhm...
“Coal”, right…?
Woah, a terrible answer when we were so close @to a perfect score!

group_1.textLeft: Are you sure about that…? No matter how you @look at it, that’s sort of-
That’s correct!

group_1.textRight: [chara:301901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh!?

group_1.textLeft: I didn’t think a companion of the PhD in Coffee @could answer with anything that weird,
so I thought about it just now.
When you sound out Columbian, you get “Coal-lum-bi-an”... or “Coal”!!

group_1.textRight: [chara:300801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!?
The coffee Ayaka-san drank was produced in Columbia...
Which means... “Coal” is the correct answer!

group_1.textCenter: (I was trying to be funny… Yet it turned out @to be the right answer…!)

group_1.textLeft: Not bad, Ayaka… For this last one, I’ll also…!

group_1.textRight: We’re right about to get a perfect streak!

group_1.textLeft: This is hard...

group_1.textRight: Huh!?

group_1.textLeft: It’s a complicated flavor… There’s multiple @candidates I could guess...

group_1.textRight: Unbelievable...
Having just hit upon the right answer, this is where @my mentor’s tastebuds will come in handy!

group_1.textLeft: Y-Yeah…
...[wait:1.0][chara:301901:motion_001][chara:301901:cheek_0][chara:301901:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:301901:lipSynch_1]Hmm? I feel like I’ve drunk something similar @to this recently.

group_1.textRight: It’s a miracle!

group_1.textLeft: I’m not sure, but… Yeah, that’s it.

group_1.textRight: This is the same flavor of coffee as what @Shizuku-chan made for me the other day.
